description: Microsoft has now released versions of its Office software for the iPad. That news came in CEO Satya Nadella's first press conference as the company head. Analysts say it's been a long time coming -- prevented by the company's hope that Office could be used to boost sales of tablets based on the Windows operating system. Plus, play along with Marketplace Tech’s Friday numbers game: Silicon Tally.

title: Marketplace Tech for Friday, March 28, 2014
